DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct evaluate effect treatment Seasonique extended-regimen oral contraceptive utilizes low dose ethinyl estradiol typical hormone-free interval . Patients receive 26 week treatment . The overall study duration approximately 9 month . Patients require record menstrual pain daily diary .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Efficacy Seasonique Treatment Cyclic Pelvic Pain
DOC.criteria: Moderate severe menstrualrelated pain Regular spontaneous menstrual cycle Any contraindication use oral contraceptive Treatment oral contraceptive last 3 month Previous treatment failure extend oral contraceptive regimen
